products.name: Lolli Lookout™ Elf & Jumbo Swirl Pop Christmas Gift Set
products.subtitle: Limited Holiday Edition
description: Bring home the magic of the holidays with our SwirleePop™ Elf & Jumbo Swirl Pop Christmas Gift Set! This limited holiday edition features a collectible Lolli Lookout Elf paired with a delicious 4" candy swirl pop.
Perfect for stockings, shelf displays, and kids' holiday fun. The Lolli Lookout Elf makes a wonderful alternative to traditional holiday elves, adding a sweet twist to your family traditions.

products.name: 2025 S'mores Holiday Mug Gift Bundle
products.subtitle: Festive Hot Cocoa Set
description: Bring home the holiday spirit with the Swirlee Pop Holiday S'mores Mug Gift Bundle, a festive all-in-one treat set made for cozy winter nights.
This curated bundle includes two holiday mugs, graham crackers, marshmallows, and a chocolate bar, giving you everything you need to make warm, delicious s'mores or hot cocoa treats at home.
features: Perfect for gifting, family nights & parties

products.name: Swirlee™ Christmas Gummies
products.subtitle: 8oz Holiday Chewy Candy Mix
description: Bring holiday cheer to your celebrations with Swirlee Christmas Gummies! This festive half pound bag features delightful gummy bear candies that make perfect stocking stuffers.
These chewy treats combine whimsical holiday shapes with delicious flavor that both kids and adults will love. Each piece is crafted to deliver the perfect gummy texture.
